entry.title: 20oz TRAVEL Tumbler - Light Ice Blue
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 12.90

 Not suitable for sublimation. Please note that these are NOT suitable for sublimation printing. They are not coated.

These double-walled stainless steel tumblers with lids are great for summer parties or wedding party gifts. 

The 20oz size lids feature a sliding lid for an option to close it. The cup can also be used without a lid.

Perfect for your hot and cold liquids.

Looks amazing with one of our reusable straws! Find them here

DISCLAIMER: Tumblers are manufactured in small batches and you will see differences between colours and finishes between different batches and dye lots, we apologize that this is out of our control. Hand-wash only and do NOT let lids soak, do not pour boiling water over them. Plastic lids will not last as long as stainless steel tumblers and replacement lids are available. Dishwashing the lids will cause hazing and cracking of the lids.

The 20oz size lids feature a sliding lid for an option to close it. The cup can also be used without a lid.

Perfect for your hot and cold 

DISCLAIMER: Tumblers are manufactured in small batches and you will see differences between colours and finishes between different batches and dye lots, we apologize that this is out of our control. Hand-wash only and do NOT let lids soak, do not pour boiling water over them. Plastic lids will not last as long as stainless steel tumblers and replacement lids are available.
